import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector, RootStateOrAny} from 'react-redux'; import { listProductById } from '../actions/productDetailActions' import star from '../assets/star.png' import { Spinner } from '../components/Spinner/Spinner'; type Props = {}; const Product = (props: Props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productByIdList = useSelector((state: RootStateOrAny) => state.productDetailReducers); const { loading, products, error } = productByIdList; useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductById()) }, [dispatch]) return products ? (
{console.log(products)}

) : }; export default Product;
